shortDescription: An Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) in the dashboard of SiSMART v7.4.0 allows attackers to execute a horizontal-privilege escalation.
vulnerabilityName: SiSMART Dashboard Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) Horizontal-Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
